title: [Aspis Embassy, Courtyard]
description: A lush green hedgerow extends from either side of a scrollworked wrought-iron gate to enclose the limestone tiled courtyard.  Small potted fruit trees decorate the corners while flowering trumpet vines climb up a free-standing pergola which bears a plaque and shades a cushion-covered lounge.  Directly across from the structure, a low table and several brightly colored chairs beckons one to relax and listen to the burbling of the nearby hot spring.
